messages.title: Why we're backing Mike Rolfe
messages.content: Homemessagesthis is Sittingbourne & sheppey. Ournhsis at breaking point. Mike understands that our future prosperity relies on the growth of our small and medium enterprises.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investing for a better Sittingbourne & Sheppey
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will invest in our area to create good jobs and strong community services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Our NHS is at breaking point
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mike pledges to fight for a fair deal for our hospital and ensure our schools are properly funded.

issues.economy: Mike understands that our future prosperity relies on the growth of our small and medium enterprises.
issues.health: Mike pledges to fight for a fair deal for our hospital and ensure our schools are properly funded.

housing.content: Labour will invest in our area to create good jobs and strong community services.

leaflet.personalStatement: "Working in the public sector I see first hand how services across the country have been damaged by years of austerity. It is time for a change. I am determined to stand up for all people in this area and fight to improve the services we all rely on" – Mike Rolfe

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST RTSG-GBRHB-E29K Park Road, Sittingbourne, ME10 1DR

Mike Rolfe alongside another individual in front of an ambulance.
